org.asl.karelx

Class Squarebot

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fcps.karel2.Item
      • edu.fcps.karel2.Robot
        • org.asl.karelx.Uberbot
          • org.asl.karelx.Squarebot

  • public class Squarebot
extends Uberbot
    An Uberbot that drops beepers to form either the corners or the entire perimeter of a square.
    Author:
    Kent Collins, December 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Squarebot()
      Create an instance at (1,1) facing EAST with infinite beepers.
      Squarebot(int x, int y)
      Create an instance at the specified coordinates, facing North with infinite beepers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void layCorners(int sideLength)
      Mark the four corners of a square with beepers
      void layPerimeter(int sideLength)
      Mark the perimeter of a square with beepers
